It is responsible for creating, updating,       retrieving, and managing policies and rules. It enforces role-based access control and ensures that only authorized       users can modify or retrieve data. The contract also supports policy cementing to prevent further modifications.","kind":"dev","methods":{"applyPolicy(address,uint256[])":{"details":"Ensures that only calling contract admins can apply policies and validates policy types.","params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the contract to apply policies to.","policyIds":"The IDs of the policies to apply."}},"cementPolicy(uint256)":{"params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to cement."}},"closePolicy(uint256)":{"details":"This function ensures that only policy admins can close a policy and that the policy is not cemented.","params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to close."}},"createPolicy((bool,bytes4,uint8[])[],(uint256[],(uint256[],uint8[],bytes[]),(uint8,uint128,bool,bool)[],(uint8,uint128,bool,bool)[],(bool,bool,uint8,uint8,bytes,bytes32,string,uint256[])[],(bool,bool,uint8,uint8,bytes,bytes32,string,uint256[])[])[],uint8)":{"details":"Generates a policy ID and initializes the policy with the specified type.","params":{"callingFunctions":"The calling functions associated with the policy.","policyType":"The type of the policy (CLOSED_POLICY or OPEN_POLICY).","rules":"The rules associated with the policy."},"returns":{"_0":"uint256 The generated policy ID."}},"deletePolicy(uint256)":{"details":"Removes the policy and all associated rules, trackers, and foreign calls. Ensures the policy is not cemented.","params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to delete."}},"getAppliedPolicyIds(address)":{"params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the contract."},"returns":{"_0":"uint256[] An array of applied policy IDs."}},"getPolicy(uint256)":{"details":"Since `Policy` contains nested mappings, the data is broken into arrays for external return.","params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy."},"returns":{"callingFunctionIds":"The calling function IDs corresponding to each calling function.","callingFunctions":"The calling functions within the policy.","ruleIds":"The rule IDs corresponding to each calling function."}},"isCementedPolicy(uint256)":{"params":{"_policyId":"The ID of the policy to check."},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the policy is cemented, false otherwise."}},"isClosedPolicy(uint256)":{"params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to check."},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the policy is closed, false otherwise."}},"openPolicy(uint256)":{"details":"This function ensures that only policy admins can open a policy and that the policy is not cemented.","params":{"policyId":"The ID of the policy to open."}},"unapplyPolicy(address,uint256[])":{"details":"Ensures that only calling contract admins can unapply policies. Removes associations between the contract and the specified policies.","params":{"_contractAddress":"The address of the contract from which policies will be unapplied.","_policyIds":"The IDs of the policies to unapply."}},"updatePolicy(uint256,bytes4[],uint256[],uint256[][],uint8)":{"details":"Updates the policy type, calling functions, and associated rules.","params":{"callingFunctionIds":"The IDs of the calling functions.","callingFunctions":"The function signatures of the calling functions in the policy.","policyId":"The ID of the policy to update.","policyType":"The type of the policy (CLOSED_POLICY or OPEN_POLICY).","ruleIds":"A two-dimensional array of rule IDs associated with the policy."},"returns":{"_0":"policyId The updated policy ID."}}},"title":"Rules Engine Policy Facet","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"PolicyCreated(uint256)":{"notice":"Policy Events "}},"kind":"user","methods":{"applyPolicy(address,uint256[])":{"notice":"Applies policies to a specified contract."},"cementPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Marks a policy as cemented, preventing further modifications."},"closePolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Closes a policy by changing its type to CLOSED_POLICY."},"createPolicy((bool,bytes4,uint8[])[],(uint256[],(uint256[],uint8[],bytes[]),(uint8,uint128,bool,bool)[],(uint8,uint128,bool,bool)[],(bool,bool,uint8,uint8,bytes,bytes32,string,uint256[])[],(bool,bool,uint8,uint8,bytes,bytes32,string,uint256[])[])[],uint8)":{"notice":"Creates a new policy and assigns a policy admin."},"deletePolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Deletes a policy from storage."},"getAppliedPolicyIds(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves the IDs of policies applied to a specific contract."},"getPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Retrieves a policy from storage."},"isCementedPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Checks if a policy is cemented."},"isClosedPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Checks if a policy is closed."},"openPolicy(uint256)":{"notice":"Opens a policy by changing its type to OPEN_POLICY."},"unapplyPolicy(address,uint256[])":{"notice":"Unapplies policies from a specified contract."},"updatePolicy(uint256,bytes4[],uint256[],uint256[][],uint8)":{"notice":"Updates a policy in applyPolicy(address,uint256[]).details: Ensures that only calling contract admins can apply policies and validates policy types.

params.contractAddress: The address of the contract to apply policies to.
params.policyIds: The IDs of the policies to apply.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to cement.

closePolicy(uint256).details: This function ensures that only policy admins can close a policy and that the policy is not cemented.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to close.

createPolicy((bool,bytes4,uint8[])[],(ui.details: Generates a policy ID and initializes the policy with the specified type.

params.callingFunctions: The calling functions associated with the policy.
params.policyType: The type of the policy (CLOSED_POLICY or OPEN_POLICY).
params.rules: The rules associated with the policy.

deletePolicy(uint256).details: Removes the policy and all associated rules, trackers, and foreign calls. Ensures the policy is not cemented.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to delete.

returns._0: uint256[] An array of applied policy IDs.

getPolicy(uint256).details: Since `Policy` contains nested mappings, the data is broken into arrays for external return.

returns.callingFunctionIds: The calling function IDs corresponding to each calling function.
returns.callingFunctions: The calling functions within the policy.
returns.ruleIds: The rule IDs corresponding to each calling function.

params._policyId: The ID of the policy to check.

returns._0: bool True if the policy is cemented, false otherwise.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to check.

returns._0: bool True if the policy is closed, false otherwise.

openPolicy(uint256).details: This function ensures that only policy admins can open a policy and that the policy is not cemented.

params.policyId: The ID of the policy to open.

unapplyPolicy(address,uint256[]).details: Ensures that only calling contract admins can unapply policies. Removes associations between the contract and the specified policies.

params._contractAddress: The address of the contract from which policies will be unapplied.
params._policyIds: The IDs of the policies to unapply.

updatePolicy(uint256,bytes4[],uint256[],.details: Updates the policy type, calling functions, and associated rules.

params.callingFunctionIds: The IDs of the calling functions.
params.callingFunctions: The function signatures of the calling functions in the policy.
params.policyId: The ID of the policy to update.
params.policyType: The type of the policy (CLOSED_POLICY or OPEN_POLICY).
params.ruleIds: A two-dimensional array of rule IDs associated with the policy.

applyPolicy(address,uint256[]).notice: Applies policies to a specified contract.

cementPolicy(uint256).notice: Marks a policy as cemented, preventing further modifications.

closePolicy(uint256).notice: Closes a policy by changing its type to CLOSED_POLICY.

createPolicy((bool,bytes4,uint8[])[],(ui.notice: Creates a new policy and assigns a policy admin.

getAppliedPolicyIds(address).notice: Retrieves the IDs of policies applied to a specific contract.

isCementedPolicy(uint256).notice: Checks if a policy is cemented.

isClosedPolicy(uint256).notice: Checks if a policy is closed.

openPolicy(uint256).notice: Opens a policy by changing its type to OPEN_POLICY.

unapplyPolicy(address,uint256[]).notice: Unapplies policies from a specified contract.
